name: forese
description: The official website of the FORum for Economic Studies by Engineers (FORESE)

scripts.imagemin: imagemin img/* -o dist/img && imagemin img/members/2nd/* -o dist/img/members/2nd && imagemin img/members/3rd/* -o dist/img/members/3rd && imagemin img/members/4th/* -o dist/img/members/4th
scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin team.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/team.html && usemin events.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/events.html && usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin

author: Nilesh D
